item.headline: Pastoral Care
item.copy: In 2004, Mt. Zion officially launched its building campaign program for the construction of a brand new ministry complex that would be attached to the current main facility. The new facilities expansion is designed to include an expansive office center, a 400-seat theatre, and a 3,800-seat main auditorium. Additionally, Mt.
